DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.Id, T1.GroupingId, T4.value FixCalendar, T5.value FixConvention, T6.value DayCounter, T7.value IndexName, T8.value Interpolated, T1.ObservationLag, T10.value AdjustInflationObservationDates, T11.value InflationCalendar, T12.value InflationConvention FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsInflationSwap T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar T4 ON T1.FixCalendar = T4.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention T5 ON T1.FixConvention = T5.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter T6 ON T1.DayCounter = T6.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName T7 ON T1.IndexName = T7.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T8 ON T1.Interpolated = T8.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T10 ON T1.AdjustInflationObservationDates = T10.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar T11 ON T1.InflationCalendar = T11.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention T12 ON T1.InflationConvention = T12.value

field.name: *FixCalendar
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value FixCalendar, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *FixConvention
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value FixConvention,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *DayCounter
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value DayCounter, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *IndexName
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value IndexName,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *Interpolated
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Interpolated,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *AdjustInflationObservationDates
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value AdjustInflationObservationDates,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *InflationCalendar
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value InflationCalendar, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *InflationConvention
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value InflationConvention,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention !T! ORDER BY value
